problem: If a bag of candy has 12 pieces and you eat 3 pieces, how many pieces are left?
If a pizza is cut into 8 slices and you eat 3 slices, how many slices are left?
If a train travels 60 miles in one hour, how far will it travel in 3 hours?
If a bike travels 15 miles per hour, how far will it travel in 2 hours?
If a box contains 12 crayons and you take out 4, how many crayons are left in the box?
If a pencil costs 15 cents and a notebook costs 50 cents, how much does it cost to buy 3 pencils and 2 notebooks?
If a tree grows 2 feet every year, how tall will it be in 5 years?
If a toy costs $5 and you have $10, how much money will you have left after buying the toy?
If a family has 4 people and each person eats 3 slices of pizza, how many slices of pizza are needed for everyone to have enough?
If a cat can run 10 miles per hour, how long will it take for the cat to run 30 miles?
If a jellybean weighs 0.1 ounce, how many jellybeans weigh 1 ounce?
If a banana costs 10 cents and an apple costs 20 cents, how much does it cost to buy 2 bananas and 1 apple?
If a dog is 3 years old in human years and ages 7 years every human year, how old is the dog in dog years after 5 years?
If you have 5 marbles and you lose 3, how many marbles do you have left?
If a football field is 100 yards long, how many feet long is it?
If a kangaroo can jump 20 feet in one hop, how many hops would it take to jump 100 feet?
If a snail can crawl 2 feet in one minute, how long does it take for the snail to crawl 10 feet?
If you have 3 pencils and you give 1 away, how many pencils do you have left?
If a pencil costs 5 cents and a notebook costs 50 cents, how much does it cost to buy 4 pencils and 2 notebooks?
If a basketball costs $10 and a football costs $5, how much does it cost to buy 2 basketballs and 3 footballs?
If a pizza has 8 slices and you eat 3, how many slices do you have left?
If a chicken lays an egg every day and you have 6 chickens, how many eggs do you have after a week?
If you have 5 fingers on each hand, how many fingers do you have altogether?
If you have 7 cookies and you eat 2, how many cookies do you have left?
If a giraffe is 18 feet tall and a basketball hoop is 10 feet tall, can a giraffe dunk a basketball?
If it takes 5 seconds for a car to drive 100 feet, how long does it take for the car to drive 1 mile?
If you have 3 apples and you give 2 away, how many apples do you have left?
If there are 24 hours in a day, how many hours are in 3 days?
If a tree grows 3 feet per year, how tall will it be in 5 years?
If a pencil costs 10 cents, how much do 5 pencils cost?
If there are 12 months in a year, how many months are in 5 years?
If there are 8 apples and you give 3 to your friend, how many apples do you have left?
If a book has 200 pages and you have read 50 pages, how many pages do you have left to read?
If you have 10 marbles and you give 2 to your friend, how many marbles do you have left?
If you have 6 pencils and you give 2 to your friend, how many pencils do you have left?
If a bird flies at 20 miles per hour for 3 hours, how far does it fly?
If a car travels at 50 miles per hour for 2 hours, how far does it travel?
If a rectangle has a length of 6 cm and a width of 4 cm, what is its area?
If a box of crayons has 24 crayons and you take out 6, how many crayons are left?
If a car travels at 60 miles per hour and you are 30 miles away, how long will it take for the car to reach you?
If a class has 25 students and 10 more students join the class, how many students are in the class now?
If a cookie recipe calls for 2 cups of flour and you want to make half the recipe, how many cups of flour do you need?
If a pizza has 8 slices and you eat 3 slices, how many slices are left?
If you have 3 friends and each friend gives you 2 stickers, how many stickers do you have in total?
If you have 10 candies and you want to share them equally with 2 friends, how many candies does each person get?
If a school has 600 students and 1/3 of them are in the 4th grade, how many students are in the 4th grade?
If you have 4 quarters, 3 dimes, and 2 nickels, how much money do you have in total?
If you have 12 pencils and you give 1/4 of them to your friend, how many pencils do you give to your friend?
If a toy car costs $5 and you have $20, how many toy cars can you buy?
If you have 5 cats and each cat has 4 legs, how many legs do your cats have in total?
If a pack of gum has 15 pieces and you chew 3 pieces a day, how many days will the pack last?
If a rectangle has a perimeter of 18 cm and a length of 5 cm, what is its width?
